category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_Category_Filter_Show_Count
preference.preference_description:
Defines the maximum number of pre-expanded filter values displayed for a filter category. Default is 50, which is configurable. This preference value can be defined with 3 values 'ALL' OR Positive Number OR 'Hidden'. Description of these values are given below. ALL: all filters will be fetched Hidden: the category will be hidden. Positive value N: normal case. the N number of filters will be fetched. Any other values: the default number of filters will be fetched.
To specify a value different from the default for a filter category, add an entry with the format of "Internal name of the property=Maximum number of expanded filter values", e.g. POM_application_object.owning_user=20.
